subject: Sexual Health
title: Vaccines for STIs
description: A quick, practical guide to Vaccines for STIs.

hook.text: Two STIs already have effective vaccines. Scientists are racing to develop more.

buildup.text: The HPV vaccine protects against strains that cause cancers. The hepatitis B vaccine prevents liver disease.

discovery.text: Countries with high vaccination rates have seen dramatic drops in cervical cancer and liver disease.

twist.text: No vaccine exists yet for HIV, herpes, or chlamydia despite decades of research into each one.

climax.text: Vaccines remain the gold standard of prevention. Every successful one saves millions of lives.

punchline.text: Two vaccines down. More are urgently needed.

quiz.question: Which STIs currently have effective vaccines?
